member.name: T:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase
member.summary: Abstract class as a foundation for various flags implementations

member.name: F:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase._bitValue
member.summary: integer value stores up to 64 flags/bits

member.name: M:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates new instance with all bits set to false (integer 0).

member.name: M:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates new instance and initialize it with value of bitValue parameter.

member.name: M:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.#ctor(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates new instance with bits set according to param array.
member.param: Boolean values to initialize class with. If their number is lower than 32, remaining bits are set to false. If more than 32 values is specified, excess values are ignored.

member.name: M:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.GetBitAsBool(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets boolean indicating whether bit on bitShift position in bitValue integer is set or not.
member.param: Zero-based position of bit to get.
member.returns: Returns boolean indicating whether bit at bitShift position is set or not.

member.name: M:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.SetBitFromBool(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets or unsets bit of bitValue integer at position specified by bitShift, depending on value parameter.
member.param: Zero-based position of bit to set.
member.returns: Returns new integer value with bit at position specified by bitShift parameter set to value.

member.name: M:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.GetIntFromBoolArray(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Creates an integer value from an array of booleans.

member.name: M:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.EnumToIndex(System.Enum)
member.summary: Converts a Flag Enum to the associated index value.

member.name: P:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets bit at position specified by index.
member.param: Zero-based index of bit to get or set.
member.returns: Boolean value indicating whether bit at position specified by index is set or not.

member.name: P:YAF.Classes.Data.FlagsBase.BitValue
member.summary: Gets or sets integer value of flags.
